SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT m.goods_name FROM goods_manage m WHERE m.delete_status = "1"
AND m.goods_category_id IN ( SELECT id FROM goods_category WHERE category_name=#{select})
AND (m.goods_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{searchText},"%") OR m.goods_brief LIKE CONCAT("%",#{searchText},"%")) ) b

SELECT m.goods_name goodsName, m.id goodsId, m.goods_price goodsPrice, m.goods_brief goodsBrief, m.goods_numbers goodsNumbers, m.business_id businessId, b.business_name businessName, TIME_FORMAT(b.business_open_time,"%H:%i") openTime, TIME_FORMAT(b.business_close_time,"%H:%i") closeTime FROM goods_manage m JOIN business b ON m.business_id=b.user_id WHERE m.delete_status = "1"
AND m.goods_category_id IN ( SELECT id FROM goods_category WHERE category_name=#{select})
AND (m.goods_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{searchText},"%") OR m.goods_brief LIKE CONCAT("%",#{searchText},"%"))
ORDER BY m.goods_price LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT c.category_name categoryName, COUNT(c.category_name) number FROM goods_manage m JOIN goods_category c ON m.goods_category_id = c.id WHERE m.delete_status = "1"
AND (m.goods_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{searchText},"%") OR m.goods_brief LIKE CONCAT("%",#{searchText},"%"))
GROUP BY c.category_name

SELECT m.id goodsId, m.goods_name goodsName, m.goods_price goodsPrice, m.goods_numbers goodsNumbers, m.goods_sale_status saleStatus, c.category_name categoryName FROM goods_manage m LEFT JOIN goods_category c ON c.id = m.goods_category_id WHERE m.id = #{goodsId} AND m.delete_status = 1
SELECT customer_balance balance, user_id customerId FROM customer WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND delete_status = 1
SELECT customer_name name, customer_address address, customer_phone_number phone FROM customer_address WHERE id = #{addressId}
